item.title: US D.O.J. Charges Canadian National In Multi-Million Crypto Fraud Scheme
item.description:
Andean Medjedovic allegedly manipulated KyberSwap’s liquidity pools and Indexed Finance index pools, stealing $65M. U.S. authorities have indicted him on multiple fraud and laundering charges, with a potential 90-year sentence if convicted.

The post US D.O.J. Charges Canadian National In Multi-Million Crypto Fraud Scheme appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Russia’s Energy Ministry Wants to Create ‘National Registry of Crypto Mining Hardware’
item.description:
Russia’s Energy Ministry has unveiled plans to create a national registry of crypto mining rigs and other related hardware.

The post Russia’s Energy Ministry Wants to Create ‘National Registry of Crypto Mining Hardware’ appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: FTX to Begin Creditor Reimbursements on February 18, 2025
item.description:
A representative of FTX creditors, Sunil, has confirmed that repayments for claims under $50,000 will begin at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time on February 18, 2025.

The post FTX to Begin Creditor Reimbursements on February 18, 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews.
